description: Application for variation of condition 2 (approved plans) of Listed Building Consent ref. 23/03500/LB, and in association with an application for a non-material amendment (23/03513/NMC) following a grant of planning permission ref: 21/01142/FUL (Refurbishment, partial demolition and extension of the existing building to provide additional office space (Use Class E(i)) and retail (Use Class E (a) or (b)) at ground floor level alongside associated cycle parking and public realm enhancements) granted on 23.12.2021.Amendment sought: To alter a number of approved drawings to facilitate the installation of three planters with integrated railing screens and lockable gates on the Level 4 external terrace and the installation of a security gate at the top of the eastern courtyard staircase.
